TopicTitle: Thinking about selling my Xbox 360 plus 19 used games?

Articles.Content: Hi i am thinking about selling my old white Xbox 360 with 19 used games for [Removed]

If I'm being honest it seems a bit high-priced to me, but that's not to say you won't find someone happy to pay that price.

I find Gamestop's second-hand prices quite high personally.

32 minutes ago, pxi said:

If I'm being honest it seems a bit high-priced to me, but that's not to say you won't find someone happy to pay that price.

I find Gamestop's second-hand prices quite high personally.

My local store said they would give 50 usd for the games.Felt a bit ripped off.Thinking of trying online sale.

Edited February 16, 2016 by Cloakedwand72

2 hours ago, Cloakedwand72 said:

Thinking of trying online sale.

Probably your best bet.

To avoid any confusion, when I was referring to finding Gamespot's prices high, I was referring to the price they will sell second-hand games at, not the price they'd give you.  It's a complete rip off.

Sorry guys but the KSP forums really aren't the place for this, there's no way the moderation team can help resolve any issues that might occur off-site due to this activity.

I'm going to have to ask you to conduct any such business on a more appropriate forum that handles classified ads between members instead of here.

Closing and cleaning up.
